entry.string: Disabling the options above will leave your registered and unregistered users with minimal access. The administrator you created in Step 6 will always have full access to the site.
entry.translation: Deesebling zee oopshuns ebufe-a veell leefe-a yuoor regeestered und unregeestered users veet meenimel eccess. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Zee edmeenistretur yuoo creeted in Step 6 veell elveys hefe-a fooll eccess tu zee seete-a.

entry.string: This configuration does not need to load any modules.
entry.translation: Thees cunffeegooreshun dues nut need tu lued uny mudooles. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: The following modules for this configuration are already installed
entry.translation: Zee fullooeeng mudooles fur thees cunffeegooreshun ere-a elreedy instelled

entry.string: The following modules for this configuration are missing in the modules directory
entry.translation: Zee fullooeeng mudooles fur thees cunffeegooreshun ere-a meessing in zee mudooles durectury

entry.string: The following modules are present that are not part of the configuration you have chosen. If you wish to, you can load them as well.
entry.translation: Zee fullooeeng mudooles ere-a present thet ere-a nut pert ooff zee cunffeegooreshun yuoo hefe-a chusee. Iff yuoo veesh tu, yuoo cun lued zeem es vell.

entry.string: All of the above modules can be installed or removed at any later time in the Modules module.
entry.translation: Ell ooff zee ebufe-a mudooles cun be-a instelled oor remufed et uny leter teeme-a in zee Mudooles mudoole-a.
